nodes.text: Star Wars: The Mixed-Up Droid is an audio book published by Time Warner Book Group in 1995. It is 20 minutes long and involves C-3PO, R2-D2 and Princess Leia. The package also includes a short comic by Dark Horse Comics that follows the story line.
Although the setting is after the Wedding of Han Solo and Leia Organa (8 ABY), which is in the New Republic era, the characters are still said to be in the Rebel Alliance.
